p: Reflecting the dynamism of the frame creation process within their study into cognitive frames Sharma and Jaiswal ( 2018) found that environmental events were triggers for frame changes. Their longitudinal study of a global Indian pharmaceutical company showed that unexpected events acted to change the temporal decision horizon altering the managerial cognitive frame applied to a given project. Temporal elements shaping frames were identified within several articles highlighting the evolutionary nature if progress on climate change (Gr√∂schl et al., 2019; Sharma & Jaiswal, 2018).
